Package com.mobilecoin.lib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DefragmentationDelegate
    This class is used to monitor and control the defragmentation process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountActivity
    The AccountActivity class provides a low-level info about the account activity.
    AccountKey
    The AccountKey class represents an abstraction of view & spent private keys
    AccountSnapshot
    This class represents the Account's state at the specified block index
    Balance
    The Balance class represents the account balance
    ClientConfig
    This class provides configuration for MobileCoinClient
    ClientConfig.Service
    Service Configuration
    KeyImage
    A 32-byte image of a private key `x`: I = x * H(x * G) = x * H(P).
    Mnemonics  
    MobileCoinClient
    The MobileCoinClient class is a high-level Fog-enabled client to access MobileCoin blockchain.
    OwnedTxOut
    A transaction output that belongs to a AccountKey
    PaymentRequest  
    PendingTransaction
    Wrapper for the Transaction and Receipt objects obtained via MobileCoinClient.prepareTransaction(PublicAddress recipient, BigInteger amount, BigInteger fee)
    PrintableWrapper  
    PublicAddress
    Represents account's public address to receive coins
    Receipt
    This receipt is created by MobileCoinClient.prepareTransaction(PublicAddress, BigInteger, BigInteger) Then shared with the recipient, so they can check the transaction status.
    RistrettoPrivate
    A RistrettoPrivate key MobileCoin accounts consist of two RistrettoPrivate keys: view & spend
    RistrettoPublic
    A RistrettoPublic key MobileCoin public addresses consist of two RistrettoPublic keys: view & spend
    StorageAdapter  
    Transaction  
    TransferPayload  
    UnsignedLong  
    Verifier
    Verifier is used for attestation connection verification.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MobileCoinClient.FeeLevel  
    Receipt.Status  
    Transaction.Status
